full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGROL DKAR DANG TSE DPAG MED KYI TSE SGRUB NGAG 'DON 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS DKA' BCU SHES RAB @005A *, ,CHOS 'BYOR DANG, DBU MDZAD RAB 'BYAMS PA TSUL KRHIMS BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG SOGS KYI RIM GROR PHRAL DU TSE SGRUB DGOS SKABS TSOGS PA'I ZHAL 'DON DU 'DI 'DRA DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO,, ZHES PA 'DI NI 'DI ^RJE RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I 'KHRUNGS GNAS SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O,, SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
